text: Ðuro Savinović (1 March 1950 – 1 February 2021) was a Croatian water polo player. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1976 Summer Olympics. He was born in Dubrovnik, Yugoslavia. Savinović died on 1 February 2021 in Dubrovnik, aged 70. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Croatia Category:Croatian water polo players Category:Olympians for Yugoslavia Category:Yugoslavian water polo players
title: Ðuro Savinović
